title: One Of Them Dumb Kids  - Kinda Funny Doodles

transcript_chunks.text: Yeah, this is all, this is an argument that shouldn't even be had anymore. Okay, they came up with a technology in the 80s that made laces completely obsolete, the Velcro, the Velcro. And for some **** dumb reason, we decided to just totally throw that out the window. Not just as an aside, I remember how much of a revelation it was when I learned how to tie my shoes. I remember just being so daunted and like, "I'm never going to be able to learn how to do this." If I sat there and thought about how I tie a shoe, I wouldn't be able to do it. Oh no, like I just have to not think about it and just tie, clear it, clear the mechanism. Yeah, it was hard for me. I was one of them dumb kids, real dumb kids. I was like holding on them Velcros as long as possible 'cause I just, I'd always mess it up and it's just like, "Great." And then the worst thing is you mess it up, you know, you get it when you're going to school and you're like, "All right, I got it. I'm good." Then it unties randomly and you're like, "I'm completely and utterly"

then the worst thing is you mess it up, you know, you get it when you're going to school and you're like, "All right, I got it. I'm good." Then it unties randomly and you're like, "I'm completely and utterly ****." Yeah, I don't know, everyone's going to make fun of me. Then people start to notice how long it's taking to tie a shoe. "Why is it taking him so long to tie his shoes, kid?" So many voices. One of them dumb kids. People start doubting themselves like, "Maybe I can help. Wait, wait, do I know how to tie sh ****?"
